about_the_game:
Hi~ I'm Ronnie, the producer of the strategy mobile game Legends of the Wild. My team is a small, fledgling development team from China with limited strength and funding.

Yet we listen to players' needs and are dedicated to delivering the fun and experience of strategy games.

After entering the game, you need to choose your faction:

  • 𝑅𝑎𝑑𝑖𝑎𝑛𝑡 𝐾𝑖𝑛𝑔𝑑𝑜𝑚

  • 𝐷𝑎𝑟𝑘𝑔𝑜𝑙𝑑 𝐶𝑖𝑡𝑦

  • 𝑁𝑜𝑟𝑡ℎ𝑙𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑇𝑢𝑛𝑑𝑟𝑎

  • 𝑇ℎ𝑒 𝐺𝑜𝑙𝑑𝑒𝑛 𝐿𝑎𝑛𝑑

All players in the faction are your teammates. You don't have to worry about being attacked.

Enjoy the excitement of conquer and fighting the dragon with your allies.

We do not sell resource packages. Occupying land is the main way to obtain resources.

Use your resources to upgrade buildings and technologies to unlock more gameplay.

Use recruitment tickets to get heroes, each team includes three heroes.

You can freely combine heroes and skills.

The level resonance system, hero replacement system, and reset system will help improve your team.

You don't need to repeatedly strengthen heroes or worry about wasting resources.

When it's ready for battle, the resource state's pass will officially open.

  • You can flexibly match the heroes in your team and win in different ways, such as killing the enemy captain, controlling the opponent's AD, or counterattacking the opponent's damage.

  • You can choose to sneak attack the enemy and win with one strike.

While actively attacking, it is also importance to defend well.：

  • Surround the mountains for defense, occupy bridges to block traffic, the terrain is your best helper!

  • Don't forget about building technology! Build walls for defense, magic towers to deal damage to incoming enemies.

In LOTW, you will be rewarded with a certain amount of honor points regardless of victory or defeat, which you can use to purchase various items and resources.

Even if your city is attacked or captured, you will not lose resources or money.

Your city will automatically move to the original birth region, and you can wait for the opportunity to come back!

After 30 to 45 days of fierce fighting, the strongest camp will break through the difficulties and gather at the Heart of the World.

Under the command of the monarch, you will finally occuppy the Heart of the World.

At the end of the season, we will rank the factions based on their city points and personal reputation.

Base on the ranking, the system will send generous rewards.

After the season ends, players will enter a new season at the announced time.

In the new season, you will be matched with your old friends and face new challenges.

Strong enemies from other servers may become your opponents in the new season.

  • We will also provide new gameplay: new maps, new heroes, new game play, etc.

At the same time, in order for everyone to enjoy a fair battle, we will reset some game progress:

  • Your heroes, skills, skins, gears, game items will be retained,

  • but your city level, hero level, skill level, city construction technology level will be reset,

which just like you start the next game after a moba game.

𝐸𝑛𝑗𝑜𝑦 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑓𝑢𝑛 𝑜𝑓 𝑓𝑖𝑔ℎ𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔!
